T02D2087:162b-1: a'arya shr'i ya ma a'a yu:k'a la s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02D2087:162b-3: 'phags pa dpal gshin rje tshe bdag nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2087:162b-5: thugs rjes sprul sku'i thabs kyis 'gro don mdzad //
T02D2087:162b-6: phrin las rnam bzhi lam la brjod pa bskyed //
T02D2087:162b-7: bskyed rdzogs lam gyi phra rags rtog pa bzlog / bcom ldan gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2087:162b-8: sgrub thabs gsal ba nyid du brjod par bya //
T02D2087:162b-9: dad dang snying rjes 'gro ba'i don mos shing //
T02D2087:162b-10: dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du ni dbang thob pas //
T02D2087:162b-11: shing gcig dur khrod la sogs gnas su ni //
T02D2087:162b-12: so phag ro ras la sogs stan la 'dug / drag po'i mchod gtor la sogs gzhung bzhin bsham //
T02D2087:162b-13: snying rje la sogs tshad med bzhi bsgoms la //
T02D2087:162b-14: kun la sgyu ma'i sems kyis gnas par bya //
T02D2087:162b-15: stong pa'i ngang las snod gyur gzhal yas khang //
T02D2087:163a-1: mkhar dur khrod bcas pa bsgom par bya //
T02D2087:163a-2: bcud gyur ya las 'od 'phros gshin rje ni //
T02D2087:163a-3: dbus su cho bdag yum dang bcas //
T02D2087:163a-4: rtsa ba'i lha lnga gshed bzhi dang //
T02D2087:163a-5: g-yas su 'chi bdag g-yon du ni //
T02D2087:163a-6: srog bdag dmar po bsgom par bya //
T02D2087:163a-7: sngags brjod pa las lha rnams bskyed //
T02D2087:163a-8: de nas mchod yon byin gyis brlab //
T02D2087:163a-9: bdud rtsi lnga yi aargha dang //
T02D2087:163a-10: tshil chen spos la dug me tog / til chen mi mar khrag chen dri //
T02D2087:163a-11: sha chen bshos la thod pa'i rda //
T02D2087:163a-12: gtor ma dpa' bo'i ston mo yang //
T02D2087:163a-14: de nas ye shes spyan drang ba //
T02D2087:163a-15: ma lus sems can mgon gyur pa //
T02D2087:163a-17: 'khor bcas ma lus gshegs su gsol //
T02D2087:163a-18: thugs dam dbang gis brtan par bzhugs //
T02D2087:163a-19: aom ya ma badzra gro dha ai aa ra li hrim hrim /
T02D2087:163a-20: zhes pas mdun du spyan drangs la /
T02D2087:163a-21: yid kyis phyag bya bstod pa brtsam //
T02D2087:163a-22: gdug pa 'dul mdzad gshin rje'i gshed kyi lha //
T02D2087:163a-23: sprul dang thod rlon sna tshogs 'dzin //
T02D2087:163a-24: 'jig byed dpa' bo 'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2087:163a-25: dza:h'um bam ho:sa ma ya tishtha lhan //
T02D2087:163a-26: zhes pas lha rnams rang la bstim //
T02D2087:163a-27: 'dod yon phyi nang gsang pa'i mchod pas mchod //
T02D2087:163a-28: phud dang dpa' bo'i ston mos mnyes par bya //
T02D2087:163a-29: mchod pa'i lha mo dpag med nam mkha' la //
T02D2087:163a-30: mchod dang bstod pa byed par bsam par bya //
T02D2087:163a-31: sdig bshags smon lam la sogs rgyas par bya //
T02D2087:163a-32: de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa gsal btab ste //
T02D2087:163a-33: brtan pa nyid du bsgom par bya //
T02D2087:163a-34: skyon ngag gi bzlas pa brtsam / bcu gsum brgya dang bzhi la sogs //
T02D2087:163a-35: las mthun pa yi bzlas pa bya //
T02D2087:163a-37: byang chub sems gnas dbu ma'i mgor //
T02D2087:163a-38: gdod nas dag pa'i thig le la //
T02D2087:163a-39: aa shad n'a da bcas pa bsgom //
T02D2087:163a-40: ri bod can la bcu gsum sngags / rab tu bskor bar bsgom par bya //
T02D2087:163a-41: khams gsum gzugs la rab tu rdul //
T02D2087:163a-42: 'gro 'od sngags kyis brjod pas 'gog / thun bzhi la sogs rim pa yis //
T02D2087:163a-43: ji ltar brtan gyi bar du bsgom //
T02D2087:163a-44: dud pa la sogs rtags zad nas //
T02D2087:163b-0: sprin med @163b nam mkha' dangs pa na //
T02D2087:163b-1: mthar thug 'od gsal zhes brjod do //
T02D2087:163b-2: bdag dang gzhan don mos pa yis //
T02D2087:163b-3: lam la brjod pa bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02D2087:163b-4: phrin las rnam bzhi brtsam par bya //
T02D2087:163b-5: bskyed pa'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02D2087:163b-6: rang snying 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la //
T02D2087:163b-7: dbus su aom yig dkar po bsgom //
T02D2087:163b-8: rtsibs brgyad 'bru brgyad bsam par bya //
T02D2087:163b-9: aom las 'od zer dkar byung bas //
T02D2087:163b-12: dbus kyi h'um yig gso bskyed bya //
T02D2087:163b-13: bzlas pa tshang nas rtags byung na //
T02D2087:163b-14: drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya //
T02D2087:163b-16: 'bru brgyad sngags rgyal rab tu phog /'od zer 'phros dang 'khor lo ni //
T02D2087:163b-17: dmigs pas drangs nas bsgral bar bsam //
T02D2087:163b-19: mngon sum nyid du khugs pa na //
T02D2087:163b-20: mnan dang sreg pa'i las bya'o //
T02D2087:163b-21: sbyor ba byang chub sems kyis zin //
T02D2087:163b-22: dngos gzhi'i ting 'dzin par chod med //
T02D2087:163b-23: rjes la bdag med rnal 'byor bya //
T02D2087:163b-24: nam mkha'i ngang du gsad bya'o //
T02D2087:163b-25: de rnams kun nas btus pa yis //
T02D2087:163b-27: bla ma'i zhabs pad brten pas blang //
T02D2087:163b-28: gzhan du 'khrul 'khor rtsom pa na /'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur //
T02D2087:163b-29: sgrub thabs sbyor ba 'di brtsams pas //
T02D2087:163b-30: 'gro kun 'jam rgyal nyid gyur cig / bcom ldan
